Units and Measures

Oven Temperatures

   Very Slow = 250F / 120C
   Slow = 300F / 149C
   Moderate = 350F / 177C
   Hot = 400F / 204C
   Very Hot = 450F / 232C

Counting

   1 dozen = 12 units
   12 dozen = 1 gross = 144 units
   12 gross = 1 great gross = 1728 units
